lead_paragraph: An article in some editions on Wednesday about the Rangers’ 2-1 loss in overtime to the Philadelphia Flyers misstated the sequence of action leading to the winning goal, by Mike Richards. Sean Avery of the Rangers turned over the puck to Flyers defenseman Jason Smith, who passed it to Richards. Avery did not send the puck directly to Richards.
